effective_patterns.evidence: After user mentioned missing her Instagram stories, Laura immediately offers solution 'If you want to see me i can send you pictures' - shows she's highly responsive to expressions of wanting to see her
Laura picks up on implicit desire from 'kinda miss that' comment about stories and proactively offers pictures - demonstrates she's tuned into his needs and willing to fulfill them
When user expresses missing visual connection through stories, Laura doesn't just acknowledge but offers direct solution 'i can send you pictures' - action-oriented response to emotional expression
Laura volunteers to share pictures when partner indicates he misses seeing her - shows she values being visually present for him and understands importance of visual connection in their relationship
'If you want to see me i can send you pictures' - conditional phrasing gives partner agency to accept or decline, making offer feel generous rather than presumptuous
After user asked 'Did you go to the gym today?', Laura provides straightforward answer 'I go to the gym later' - shows she responds well to simple questions about her routine

User's question about gym indicates he knows she has this routine; Laura confirms with specific timing detail 'later' - questions about known activities demonstrate attentiveness and get informative responses
